mapper.insert: insert into user (nickname, email, password, introduce) values (#{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{introduce})
mapper.select: select user_idx as userIdx, password, nickname, email, login_type as loginType, introduce, disclosure, create_at as createAt, update_at as updateAt, deleted from user having email = #{email}
select user_idx as userIdx, password, nickname, email, login_type as loginType, introduce, disclosure, create_at as createAt, update_at as updateAt, deleted from user having nickname = #{nickname}
select user_idx as userIdx, password, nickname, email, login_type as loginType, introduce, disclosure, create_at as createAt, update_at as updateAt, deleted from user having user_idx = #{userIdx}
select if(count(*) != 0, 1, 0) from user_tag where user_idx = #{userIdx} and content = #{content}
select content from user_tag where user_idx = #{userIdx}
